snippet.title: Loopsturctor-Update Trailer
snippet.description:
Search Loopstructor/玩个Gui in Steam
《Loopstructor》 is a strategy tower defense survival Roguelike game. Players need to design defense lines, assemble battle carts, activate orbital vehicle class and vulnerable field domain, and build a powerful firepower network to roast, freeze, and even electrocute waves of enemies to pieces! Keep experimenting with different combinations of vehicle carts to slaughter the monsters.
Join the community:discord.gg/ZKQGfxAJ
